snippet: The Bancroft Prize goes to studies of the American West, the civil rights movement and an intellectual history of the 1970s and 1980s.
abstract: The Bancroft Prize goes to studies of the American West, the civil rights movement and an intellectual history of the 1970s and 1980s.

headline.main: Bancroft Prize for History Goes to Three Scholars
headline.print_headline: Three Scholars Honored With Bancroft Prize
